title: Olympia Valance's sheer white gown at Channel 10 Upfronts
text:
She's known for nailing the fashion stakes on and off the red carpet.

And actress Olympia Valance didn't skip a beat at the Channel 10 Upfronts in Melbourne on Friday afternoon.

The 26-year-old flaunted her showstopping figure in a white dress with black polka dots and enhanced the look with sheer sleeves.

Showstopper: Olympia Valance flaunted her svelte figure in a white dress with black polka dots and sheer sleeves

She looked fresh faced, keeping her make up simple and pulling her brunette tresses into a low messy bun.

The Playing For Keeps star got playful on the red carpet as she flicked her dress for the camera.

She recently revealed that she hasn't spent a night apart from her boyfriend, Thomas Bellchambers, since they moved in together in June.

Getting playful: The 26-year-old brunette beauty flicked her dress for the cameras

Stunner: She kept her make-up simple, pulling her hair back into a low messy bun

The handsome AFL player currently plays for the Essendon 'Bombers' Football Club.

In September she took to her Instagram sharing a sweet snap of herself and Thomas cosying up together while going for a boat ride.

The couple looked smitten with each other as they huddled close together for the holiday snap, which Olympia captioned: 'Island Life.'

Smitten: The actress has been dating Essendon AFL player Thomas Bellchambers, who moved in together in June

Ride or die: The pair recently took a trip to Bali, sharing this stunning photo onto Thomas' Instagram as they flaunted their envious figures

Thomas meanwhile took to Instagram to share a snap of himself in the pool with Olympia, captioning it: 'Ride or die.'

Olympia will return to TV screens later this month for season two of Playing For Keeps on Channel 10.

The soap opera also stars Madeleine West, Annie Maynard, and Cece Peters.
description: She's known for nailing the fashion stakes on and off the red carpet.
